p: The evaluation of larvicidal activity is in agreement with studies made by Pavela et al. [ 54]. That determined the value LC 50 > 100 mg·L −1 against larvae of Culex quinquefasciatus, having as a major component the monoterpene which is L-(−)-menthol, in which the participation in the EO differs depending on the genotype of 20.5% to 57.3%, together with carvone (0.0 to 56.8%) and piperitenone oxide (0.0 to 31.8%).
